descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties proudly presents this great fully-furnished and well-maintained 1-bedroom apartment for sale in The Lofts, Downtown Dubai. The tower is located in one of the best-situated parts of the Dubai downtown, right next to Dubai Opera building, adjoining building links to the metro station and mall with an excellent view of the Boulevard. The property is rented till next year with 8% ROI and for AED 7,500 per month. It's a stock of great value and new in the market.
* 1 Bedroom
* BUA: 741 sq.ft.
* 2 Bathrooms
* Fully furnished
* Fully fitted semi-open kitchen
* 1 Parking space
Amenities and facilities:
* Swimming pool
* Private courtyards and gardens
* Cafeteria
* Pharmacy
* Restaurants
* Shops
* Professional laundry services
* 24/7 security 
The bold and dynamic design of The Loft Towers offers spaciousness in the heart of the city along with the heightened sense of space and light. When you're not out and about, you can sit back and enjoy the fresh air or stroll through one of the private courtyards and gardens or take in the spectacular views of the northern crescent of Downtown Burj Dubai. The buildings were designed to create a home for the mind, body and soul!"]

descriptions: ["DescriptionStunning 4 Bedroom Villa (Type 14)Swimming Pool, Gazebo & Landscaped GardenLaminated wooden floorsPerfect Family HomeHouse Hunters are pleased to offer this immaculate 4 bedroom villa, situated in the popular community of Terranova. On the ground floor there is a spacious living environment with all four bedrooms situated on the first floor. Enter the property and walk through the entrance hall into the dining area and living room; the separate kitchen adjoins a family/informal dining room, with immediate access to the garden. In addition, there is a downstairs cloakroom and maid's room, laundry area and also direct access to the garage area, with parking for two vehicles.\xa0The first floor has a spacious Master Bedroom with en-suite bathroom; Bedroom 2 also has an en-suite and the two additional bedrooms share the family bathroom; all rooms are spacious and have fitted wardrobes.\xa0\xa0The garden has been very tastefully upgraded with a beautiful pool providing the centre piece, along with a reed topped gazebo and patio area. There is also ample lush landscaping and sufficient space for a family to enjoy entertaining and relaxing.\xa0Call me to view today!Permit no.\xa02107229079"]
